title: "Nali-Kali goes on air from tomorrow"
excerpt: "The Department of Education is launching ‘Kaliyutta Naliyona’, a new radio programme based on the Nali-Kali initiative, from January 11, Primary and Secondary Education Minister S Suresh Kumar announced on Saturday."
